content: i see so many projects on ravelry where the knitter has used my crocodilly mocs 1 pattern and changed it up a bit with a ribbed cuff instead of the crocodile stitch i d thought i d go ahead and write it up as a pattern for those not interested in a croc stitch cuff this really is in my opinion a better dorm boot made the same way as the traditional dorm boot knit flat and seamed at the end these knit up fairly fast - i can knit one slipper in 2 hours stitches used include knit purl sl-1 psso k2tog p2tog k3tog ssk for the lace edition of this slipper click here 2 for the deluxe cuff edition of this slipper click here 3 for mens edition of these slippers see here better dorm boots for men /patterns/library/better-dorm-boots-for-men like kriskrafter on facebook for updates on new patterns discussions etc kriskrafter 4 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crocodilly-mocs-for-women 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/better-dorm-boots-lace-edition 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/better-dorm-boots-deluxe 4 https //www facebook com/kriskrafter
